title: Cheesy Smoked Sausage and Potato Soup
ingredients: ['1 onion, chopped', '50g margarine', '825ml chicken stock', '6 potatoes, peeled and cubed', '450g smoked sausage', '450g processed cheese, such as Kraft singles, unwrapped and chopped', '700ml evaporated milk', 'ground black pepper to taste', '1 tablespoon cornflour']
